articles.title: AI Revolutionizes Healthcare Diagnostics
articles.summary: New AI systems are outperforming doctors in identifying rare diseases, increasing diagnostic accuracy by 25%.

articles.title: Retailers Adopt AI to Personalize Shopping
articles.summary: Major retailers are using AI to tailor online shopping experiences, boosting sales and customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Financial Firms Use AI for Fraud Detection
articles.summary: Banks and fintech companies are leveraging machine learning to detect fraudulent transactions in real-time.
